name: FATHER LUKE
motto: Vengeance belongs to the Lord, lad. Let me show you.
story: Father Luke never intended to be Gods terrible sword, but he finds the life suits him. As a shepherd of his tiny flock in the village of Lismore, he became aware of a gain movement towards oceultism among his congregation. Little oceurs that remains hidden in such small communities, and a few sudden disappearances aroused his suspicion. He expected something nefarious. when he investigator. He did not expect something-so horrific.
